text: YP is hiring for 2 engineering positions on the Digital Markets team in NYC (http://jobs.yp.com/job/New-York-Software-Engineer%2C-Digital... and http://jobs.yp.com/job/New-York-Senior-RTB-Developer-NY/3929...) as well as a few other NYC-based roles (http://jobs.yp.com/search?location=new+york%2C+ny).
